MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY24 postcode area of Borth, affecting properties in Bow Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:46am. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a tree on the overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:23pm on 31st October 2020.
